name: Spell Weaver
description: Spell Weaver is a ranged mage class equiped with a staff. This class can manipulate the elements on the battle field and has a gauge called “Mana“, which is required to cast some spells. Mana doesn't recover over time and needs to be charged up by using certain skills.You can learn various attribute attacks, including fire, ice, and lightning. It has high power and attribute effects, which are more effective in party battles.
quote: A high-difficulty, long-distance class suitable for parties. Stay safe from the front line with the ability to eliminate enemies by firing high-power attribute attacks

basicSkills.name: Sub Action
basicSkills.description: Shoots trinity bolts, which recover mana.

tacticalSkills.name: Fire Blast
tacticalSkills.description: Consumes mana. Shoots a fireball, which can be charged up to 3 levels. Charged level increases the damage of the fireball.

tacticalSkills.name: Flame Grenade
tacticalSkills.description: Send a ball of fire which explodes when touching the enemy. Can be charged up to 3 times.

tacticalSkills.name: Fire Blast
tacticalSkills.description: Consumes mana. Shoots a fireball, which can be charged up to 3 levels. Charged level increases the damage of the fireball.

tacticalSkills.name: Lightning
tacticalSkills.description: Shoots lightning bolts, which can be charged up to 3 levels. Charged level increases the amount of lightning bolts. At max charge you will get charge time reduction buff for all your skills.

tacticalSkills.name: Thunder Mine
tacticalSkills.description: Summons a lightning mine following the enemy to the hit and causes an explosion. At each charge level, a mine is added.

tacticalSkills.name: Blizzard
tacticalSkills.description: Places a chargeable snowstorm, which slows and damages enemies in it. Charge time increases the size of the storm and damage.

tacticalSkills.name: Frigid Crash
tacticalSkills.description: Summons a lightning mine following the enemy to the hit and causes an explosion. At each charge level, a mine is added.

tacticalSkills.name: Follow Bullet
tacticalSkills.description: Summons two crystal. For each skill used, the crystals will inflict damage on the enemy depending on the element of the skill.

ultimateSkill.name: Meteor Inferno
ultimateSkill.description: Summons a huge meteor, which deals enormous damage.
